Sentencas: This article applies computational fluid dynamics (CFD) to investigate the thermal and flow fields in the afterburner of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) systems.
Titulo: Numerical analysis of afterburner chamber design for solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: The objective is to estimate the performance of the burner to serve as a reference for performance improvement through structure design.
Titulo: Numerical analysis of afterburner chamber design for solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: The elliptical baffled burner, which enhances the effect of convective heat transfer and temperature uniformity effectively and suppresses the NOx formation as well, is proposed in this work.
Titulo: Numerical analysis of afterburner chamber design for solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: Additionally, low residual fuel exhaust and pressure drop are achieved.
Titulo: Numerical analysis of afterburner chamber design for solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: These advantages make it highly capable of being adopted in the industrial and commercial SOFC systems.
Titulo: Numerical analysis of afterburner chamber design for solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: The fuel of lower caloric value causes decreases in temperature and generation of NOx in the burner as the stack fuel utilization increases.
Titulo: Numerical analysis of afterburner chamber design for solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: For a 25 kW SOFC system, the stack fuel utilization of 80% reduces exhaust temperature by 65 K and NO emission by 38% than that of 70%.
Titulo: Numerical analysis of afterburner chamber design for solid oxide fuel cell system
